projects.title: Goncengan
projects.description: This is a mobile application for online motorcycle taxis for students. I developed the backend of the application with Express and Nodejs.
projects.techStack: JavaScript, Nodejs, Express, Payment Gateway (Midtrans), Firebase.
features: Find the nearest driver.
Find the nearest passenger.

projects.title: Login System
projects.description: This is my backend and frontend login system application to fulfill the entry task in the PT.DCAA interview.
projects.techStack: Python, Flask, Mysql, JavaScript, Reactjs, Redux, AntD, Nginx, and Docker.
features: Register user.
Login user.
Update user profile, username, and password.
Delete account.

projects.title: Periodic Table
projects.description: This is a periodic table website application with an interactive display to find out the details of its cells and classification by group. I developed the front-end of this application with Bootstrap.
features: Display detailed information from a cell with a popup modal.
Classification of elements based on groups.

projects.title: Invisible Maze Game
projects.description: This is an invisible maze game where players are required to memorize the walls of the maze in a short time, then the walls will disappear and the player must run the object to reach the finish.
features: Makes the wall disappear within a specified time.
Makes the player able to move with the arrow keys.

projects.title: PIK-R Website
projects.description: This is a website application for the PIKR (Youth Counseling Center and Information) organization of the Sumatra Institute of Technology. I developed the front-end of this website with Wordpress.
features: Information about PIK-R organization.
News Article.

projects.title: AuraSkin
projects.description: This is an iOS application to detect the ingredients of a skincare product whether it is good for our skin type or not. I as a programmer developed this application with my 4 teammates using SwiftUI, CoreData, and Cosmily API.
features: Detecting ingredient text from skincare products.
Analyze the ingredients to see if they suit your skin type.

projects.title: BookChat
projects.description: This is an iOS app to help book readers retain information from books they have read. I as a programmer developed this app with my 2 teammates using UiKit and CoreData.
features: Chat bot to actively recall information from books that have been read.

projects.title: PinBI
projects.description: This is a macOS app to help students correct their Indonesian writing. I am here as a programmer who creates the front-end view with SwiftUI, connections with Core Data, and creates a backend server with Nodejs for Prompting to GeminiAPI.
projects.techStack: SwiftUI, SwiftData, GeminiAPI, Express, and Nodejs.
features: Analysis of Indonesian writing according to EYD.

projects.title: Unsummon: Super Scary Game
projects.description: This is a fun and horror themed multiplayer iOS game. I am here as a programmer who makes multiplayer connections with Unity, Netcode, and Relay service.
projects.techStack: Unity, Netcode, Relay & Lobby Service, Corehaptics, Gyroscope, and Speech Framework.
features: Joining Lobby.
Haptic if in the radius of the ghost.
Gyroscope in hiden mechanic.
Speech Recognition in uncurse candle.
If become a Ghost can kill the children and curse candle.
If become a Children can activate and uncruse candle.
If it has been killed it can become a spirit to spectacle.
Noise in spirit to deceive the ghost.
Run or jump for increase speed.

projects.title: EcoPoin
projects.description: An application that helps people find the nearest landfill and earn points for their waste.
features: Tracks nearby trash dumps.
Awards points to the person who created the trash.

projects.title: QuranLingo
projects.description: This is an application to improve understanding of the verses of the Quran using the Quiz method like the Duolingo application.
features: Quiz feature to test understanding of Quran verses.
Multiple Choice Quiz Text
Multiple Choice Quiz Audio
Word Matching Text
Word Matching Audio

projects.title: Qalamini
projects.description: This is game-based application that helps children learn to write hijaiyah letters.
features: AI-Based Handwriting Detection.
Gamification such as scores, lives, wins and losses, levels, and leaderboards.
